name: Fury Little Princess on The Road Shooting Games
name_original: Fury Little Princess on The Road Shooting Games
description:
***EPIC SHOOTING GAME IN PRINCESS WORLD ***

In Free Version Game Start with 200 Coins & 10 Diamonds

Fantastic 2D shooting game in Princess style! Let's free to unlock our companions! To unlock all unique GUN!!!!
Let Make Princess Hero TEAM to destroy all of you enemy and collect all items in your race!
##GAME FEATURES##
- Make strategy unique team from 9 heroes for rival in the exciting journal.
- EXTRA GUN makes for you like fire, cannon, bomb, and ice gun.
- 80+ unique monsters, traps and turrets.
- 35 BRUTAL BOSS in unique.
- 35 Stage levels in story mode.
- Non-stop fun with endless mode to battle the entire enemy.
- Rescue the hostage to get diamond box and get free many prizes.
- Very cute and cool HD graphics.
- Collect the items to get FEVER explore the WORLD of GALAXY STAR!!!
- Get all characters and gun for your collection.
So what are you waiting for
SHOOTING IT NOW!!!
